entry.title: [BHS5/GRA5/7/9][ManagedKubernetesService] - Nodes underlying OS LTS update
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 22, 08:30 UTC  -  May 31, 16:00 UTC

Apr 7, 10:16 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/05/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 31/05/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will upgrade our public cloud nodes underlying OS from Ubuntu 18.04 LTS to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS.
Only clusters with an upgrade policy set to "always update" are targeted
